current.promo-bar-text: FREE Shipping For USA Orders Over $50
current.login-text:
Creating an account is fast, easy, and free. You'll be able to manage your autoships, track your orders, write reviews, and more!

  • See personalized recommendations
  • View inner circle rewards
  • Manage autoship & save
  • View your order history
  • Change your order history
  • Change your shipping address
  • Get exclusive offers, discounts, and more

settings.text1: Bill says he's never been too conscious of his prosthesis. He doesn't really think about it anymore, except when his granddaughter calls it a robot leg...
settings.text2: Life with a prosthesis was difficult at first. He had expected to master it quickly and go on with his life, he had expectations...
